com.joliciel.talismane.parser.output

Interface ParseConfigurationProcessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CorpusModifier, CorpusProjectifier, CorpusStatisticsWriter, FreemarkerParseWriter, NonProjectiveStatisticsWriter, ParseFeatureTester, ParseOutputRewriter, StandoffSentenceWriter, StandoffWriter, TransitionLogWriter

    public interface ParseConfigurationProcessor
extends java.io.Closeable
    Any class that can process parse configurations generated by the parser.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<ParseConfigurationProcessor> getProcessors(java.io.Writer writer, java.io.File outDir, TalismaneSession session)
      Collect the processors specified in the configuration key talismane.core.[sessionId].parser.output.processors.

      Each processor must implement this interface and must have a constructor matching one of the following signatures:
      - ( File outputDir, TalismaneSession session)
      - ( TalismaneSession session)

      Optionally, it can have a constructor with the following signature:
      - ( Writer writer, TalismaneSession session)
      If a writer is provided here, then the first processor with the above constructor will be given the writer.
      void onCompleteParse()
      Called when parsing is complete.
      void onNextParseConfiguration(ParseConfiguration parseConfiguration)
      Called when the next parse configuration is available for processing.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

                       throws TalismaneException,

        Called when the next parse configuration is available for processing.
        Throws:
        TalismaneException - if an known exception occurs when processing this parse configuration

      • getProcessors

        static java.util.List<ParseConfigurationProcessor> getProcessors(java.io.Writer writer,
                                                                 java.io.File outDir,
                                                                 TalismaneSession session)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                 java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException,
                                                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                                 TalismaneException
        Collect the processors specified in the configuration key talismane.core.[sessionId].parser.output.processors.

        Each processor must implement this interface and must have a constructor matching one of the following signatures:
        - ( File outputDir, TalismaneSession session)
        - ( TalismaneSession session)

        Optionally, it can have a constructor with the following signature:
        - ( Writer writer, TalismaneSession session)
        If a writer is provided here, then the first processor with the above constructor will be given the writer.
        Parameters:
        writer - if specified, will be used for the first processor in the list with a writer in the constructor
        outDir - directory in which to write the various outputs
        session - to read the configuration
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        TalismaneException - if a processor does not implement this interface, or if no constructor is found with the correct signature
        java.lang.ReflectiveOperationException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
